name: Bismarck Aero Center
about: Bismarck Aero Center is a comprehensive aviation service provider and flying school based at the Bismarck Municipal Airport. With over 30 years of experience, we offer a wide range of services including flight instruction, aircraft maintenance, avionics repair, and professional aircraft fueling. Our FAA Certified Flight Instructors provide personalized training for private and commercial pilot licenses, allowing students to progress at their own pace. We are committed to exceptional customer service, integrity, and community involvement, hosting events like the Annual Aviation Career Day and supporting local causes. Our team of over 40 skilled aviation professionals ensures prompt and professional treatment for all our clients. Bismarck Aero Center is dedicated to adding value to every aviation experience.
